data.text:
[[File:|link=]]

Episode 4 is an episode in the Yo-Kai Watch anime series.

Summary[]

After receiving the Yo-Kai Dictionary from Whisper, Keita discovers the Yo-Kai Himojii is at his local convenience store, making people unnaturally hungry. Later, Keita discovers that the reason he and his friends are all forgetting things at home is because of the Yo-Kai Wasurenb≈ç. Jinmenken's barber shop is ruined because everyone thinks he is a dog groomer.

Episode Structure[]
